long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PullPal helps you keep track of your GitHub pull requests (PRs). Features include:
* An icon in the Chrome navbar which displays the number of pull request reviews assigned to you
* Chrome notifications whenever a new review is requested of you
* A small PR dashboard, showing you:
    * PRs awaiting your review
    * Your approved PRs, waiting for you to merge them.
    * Your PRs awaiting reviews from others
    * Your draft PRs
